title: Drawing, "Design for a Bowl", 1936
medium: Pen and black ink, white chalk, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: COUPE; lower right: J.P./36/1.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Spherical body with inverted lip drawn in plan and elevation raised on circular base decorated around the outer edge with large spheres indicated in off-white chalk. Underdrawing in graphite of bowl in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Bowl", 1936.
1936. Pen and black ink, white chalk, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-22.
